mx-puppet-discord.summary: [mx-puppet-discord](https://github.com/matrix-discord/mx-puppet-discord) is a (double)puppeting and relay bridge for discord, based on mx-puppet-bridge

matrix-media-repo.summary: [matrix-media-repo](https://github.com/turt2live/matrix-media-repo) is a highly customizable multi-domain media repository for Matrix

mx-puppet-bridge.summary: [mx-puppet-bridge](https://github.com/Sorunome/mx-puppet-bridge) is a general bridging library that supports (double)bridging and relays. The goal is to make it as easy as possible for others to bridge new third-party protocols to matrix. [Support room](https://matrix.to/#/#mx-puppet-bridge:sorunome.de) [Donate](https://liberapay.com/Sorunome)

mx-puppet-voipms.summary: [mx-puppet-voipms](https://github.com/zoenb/mx-puppet-voipms) is a puppeting bridge for the SMS functionallity provided by [voip.ms](https://voip.ms). It is based on [mx-puppet-bridge](https://github.com/Sorunome/mx-puppet-bridge).

nheko.summary: [Nheko](https://github.com/Nheko-Reborn/nheko) is a desktop client using Qt, Boost.Asio and C++17. It supports E2EE (with the notable exception being device verification for now) and intends to be full featured and nice to look at
nheko.title: Nheko

https://github.com/ruma/.summary: Ruma is a Rust project to create a comprehensive set of APIs for Matrix. Previously there was a Ruma homeserver project.

dendrite.summary: Dendrite is a next-generation homeserver written in Go

https://git.koesters.xyz/timo/conduit.summary: A Matrix homeserver written in Rust https://conduit.rs

https://github.com/devinr528/rumatui.summary: WIP Command line Matrix client using matrix-rust-sdk

#test:zemos.net.summary: Construct is a performance-focused homeserver written in C++

gomuks.summary: [gomuks](https://maunium.net/go/gomuks) is a terminal based Matrix client written in Go. [Source on GitHub](https://github.com/tulir/gomuks)

https://github.com/spantaleev/matrix-doc.summary: This [Ansible playbook](https://github.com/spantaleev/matrix-docker-ansible-deploy) is meant to easily let you run your own Matrix homeserver.

riot web.summary: A glossy Matrix collaboration client for the web. https://riot.im

https://github.com/devture/matrix-corpor.title: Matrix Corporal
https://github.com/devture/matrix-corpor.summary: [matrix-corporal](https://github.com/devture/matrix-corporal) manages your Matrix server according to a configuration policy

conduit.summary: Conduit is a Matrix homeserver written in Rust https://conduit.rs

https://hex.pm/packages/polyjuice_client.summary: [Polyjuice Client](https://hex.pm/packages/polyjuice_client) is a Matrix library for Elixir

https://git.pattle.im/pattle.summary: Pattle is a client written for Flutter using Dart
